contentrichtext.text: {{BLP sources|date=April 2013}} {{nihongo|'''Yasunori Matsumoto'''|松本 保典|Matsumoto Yasunori|born February 7, 1960 in [[Matsudo, Chiba]]}} is a Japanese [[voice actor]]. He works for [[Sigma Seven]]. ==Career== Some of Matsumoto's most notable roles are [[Wataru Akiyama]] in ''[[Initial D]]'', [[Jean Havoc]] in ''[[Fullmetal Alchemist]]'', Magnum Ace in [[Shippū! Iron Leaguer]], [[Gourry Gabriev]] in ''[[Slayers]]'' and Ryo Hibiki in ''[[Sonic Soldier Borgman]]''. His wife was voice actress Junko Sakuma, who died in March 2011.{{Citation needed|date=April 2013}} ==Voice roles== {{BLP unsourced section|date=April 2013}} ===Anime=== *Yutaro Katori/Fighbird in [[The Brave Fighter of Sun Fighbird]] *Black Gaine/Black Might Gaine in [[The Brave Express Might Gaine]] *Shuntarou in [[Brave Exkaiser]] *Takeshi Furuhata in ''[[Kaiji (manga)|Kaiji]]'' *Kyoshiro in ''[[Lady Blue (anime)|Lady Blue]]'' *Kazuya in ''[[Adventure Kid]]'' *Takeaki in ''[[Urotsukidoji]]'' *Buju in ''[[Urotsukidoji]]'' *Fudō Myō-ō Ācalanātha in ''[[Legend of Heavenly Sphere Shurato|Tenkū Senki Shurato]]'' *Bowman Jean in ''[[Star Ocean EX]]'' *[[Alejandro Corner]] in ''[[Mobile Suit Gundam 00]]'' *Ross Syllibus in ''[[Armitage III]]'' (the original) *[[Napoleon]] in ''[[Captain Tsubasa]]'' *Gai Kurasawa in ''[[Darker Than Black]]'' *Kenji in ''[[Elven Bride]]'' *Stoner in ''[[Eureka Seven]]'' *Jean Havoc in ''[[Fullmetal Alchemist]]'' (1st Anime) *Juna in ''[[Futari wa Pretty Cure]]'' *Wan Paul in ''[[Get Backers]]'' *[[Hiroshi Nakano]] in ''[[Gravitation (anime)|Gravitation]]'' *Kenneth Leymon in ''[[Growlanser III: The Dual Darkness]]'' *Archanfel in ''[[Guyver: The Bioboosted Armor]]'' *Tsubasa in ''[[Kannazuki no Miko]]'' *Sonsaku Hakufu in ''[[Koutetsu Sangokushi]]'' *Shishimaru in ''[[Kuro no Shishi]]'' (OVA) *Raven in ''[[Kyou Kara Maoh!]]'' *Shunsaku Kudo in ''[[Idol Defense Force Hummingbird]]'' *Goemon in ''[[Legend of the Mystical Ninja (TV series)]]'' *Robot Impact in ''[[Legend of the Mystical Ninja (TV series)]]'' *Noriyasu Seta in ''[[Love Hina]]'' *Magnum Ace in '' [[Shippū! Iron Leaguer]]'' *Kaos in ''[[Madara (manga)|Madara]]'' *Galian in ''[[MÄR]]'' *Kouji Sugimoto in ''[[Metal Skin Panic MADOX-01]]'' *Ganryu and Kizashi Haruno in ''[[Naruto: Shippuden]]'' *Shukaido in ''[[Please Save My Earth]]'' *Adult Lunick/Adult Kazuki in ''[[Pokémon (anime)]] *Neko-sensei in ''[[Princess Tutu]]'' *Schezo Wegey in ''[[Puyo Puyo~n]]'' *Kujaku in ''[[RG Veda]]'' *Hiroya Matsumoto / [[Shinesman Red]] in ''[[Shinesman]]'' *Ralph Bomerz in ''[[Silent Möbius]]'' *[[Gourry Gabriev]] in ''[[Slayers]]'' *[[Knuckles the Echidna]] in ''[[Sonic the Hedgehog: The Movie]]'' (OVA) * Captain Nidhogg in ''[[Soul Eater (anime)|Soul Eater]]'' *Noal in ''[[Tekkaman Blade]]'' *Virgil Walsh in ''[[Trinity Blood]]'' *Kantai in ''[[Twelve Kingdoms]]'' *[[Toya (YuYu Hakusho)|Toya]] in ''[[YuYu Hakusho]]'' *Major Zairin in ''[[Zoids Genesis]]'' *Wester in [[Fresh Pretty Cure!]] *Umigishi in [[Papuwa|Nangoku Shōnen Papuwa-kun]] ===Games=== *''[[Logos Panic]]'' *[[Hercules (Disney character)|Hercules]] in ''[[Kingdom Hearts]]'' and ''[[Kingdom Hearts II]]'' *Guy Cecil in ''[[Tales of the Abyss]]'' *Double in ''[[Mega Man X4|Rockman X4]]'' ([[Mega Man X4]]) *Karune in [[Tengai
